gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 114, Pistons 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Pistons, 114-106. Joel Embiid led the way with 33 points, 16 rebounds, and three assists for the 76ers, with Tyrese Maxey (29 points, 11 assists) and Tobias Harris (24 points, five rebounds) combining for 53 points in the victory. Killian Hayes tallied 23 points, five rebounds, and six assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The 76ers improve to 1-0 in East Group A play, and 7-1 in the regular season, while the Pistons fall to 0-1 in East Group A play; and 2-8 in the regular season.
